spells.name: Anthropomorphic Animal
spells.description: Animal becomes bipedal.

spells.name: Ash Storm
spells.description: Hamper vision and movement.

spells.name: Cackling Skull
spells.description: Skull acts as magic mouth, listeners are shaken.

spells.name: Countless Eyes
spells.description: Extra eyes give all-around vision.

spells.name: Eldritch Fever
spells.description: Target gains the eldritch ague spellblight.

spells.name: Eruptive Pustules
spells.description: Acid boils burst when you are attacked.

spells.name: Excruciating Deformation
spells.description: Target takes Dex and Con damage.

spells.name: Howling Agony
spells.description: Screaming pain limits the target's actions.

spells.name: Ki Leech
spells.description: Add to your ki pool when you critically hit.

spells.name: Loathsome Veil
spells.description: Nauseates and/or sickens weak creatures.

spells.name: Marionette Possession
spells.description: As magic jar, but limited to line of sight.

spells.name: Rain of Frogs
spells.description: Summon a swarm of poisonous frogs.

spells.name: Reckless Infatuation
spells.description: Target is compelled to stay near another.

spells.name: Sands of Time
spells.description: Target temporarily ages.

spells.name: Spit Venom
spells.description: Spit blinding black adder venom.

spells.name: Strangling Hair
spells.description: Your hair animates and grapples.

spells.name: Unadulterated Loathing
spells.description: Target is compelled to avoid another creature.

spells.name: Vermin Shape I
spells.description: Take the form and some of the powers of a Small or Medium vermin.

spells.name: Vision of Hell
spells.description: Illusory hellscape makes creatures shaken.

spells.name: Witness
spells.description: See through the target's eyes and ears.
